bug.author: vishal-246
bug.description: Hi, I've built RSS variant of carla and with python3 i have the libad_rss_python3 import error. error is shown below $ python3 manual_control_rss.py pygame 1.9.6 Hello from the pygame community. https://www.pygame.org/contribute.html Traceback (most recent call last): File "manual_control_rss.py", line 77, in <module> from rss_sensor import RssSensor # pylint: disable=relative-import File "/carla/carla-0.9.9.4/PythonAPI/examples/rss/rss_sensor.py", line 21, in <module> from rss_visualization import RssDebugVisualizer # pylint: disable=relative-import File "/carla/carla-0.9.9.4/PythonAPI/examples/rss/rss_visualization.py", line 26, in <module> import libad_rss_python3 as rss ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'libad_rss_python3' Please help me to solve this. Thank you.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fpasch>@fpasch</denchmark-link> could you please help with this?

That error looks like you're using a Python Egg without RSS enabled. Please ensure, that
you've build it with rss enabled (e.g. make PythonAPI.rss.2) the search order in your PYTHONPATH is pointing to the right egg.

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fpasch>@fpasch</denchmark-link> Sorry for the late replay. A1. Yes i have built it with rss enabled only difference is i haven't mentioned version like u have suggested. B'coz since make PythonAPI.rss it self takes care of generating egg for python versions. A2. For Python2 API its pointing to the right path as well as for Python3 if not it would have thrown the carla NoModule Found error.
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
